UD_WidgetControl
ScriptName UD_WidgetControl extends Quest

This module contains functions for manipulating widgets.  It has two states: "Default" and "iWidgetInstalled".  Many of the functions defined here will work differently, depending on what state the script is in.  For example, status icons will not be displayed in the standard interface rendering mode, although their state will be changed and saved from API calls.

Config
Ready
Bool Property Ready = False Auto Hidden

Will be toggled to True once script is ready.

Do not edit, READ ONLY!.

iWidget
iWant_Widgets Property iWidget Hidden

iWant_Widgets object. Used to interract with iWantWidgets mod.

Do not edit, READ ONLY!.

UD_UseIWantWidget
Bool Property UD_UseIWantWidget Hidden

If True then UI rendered with iWantWidgets mod.

Do not edit, READ ONLY!. Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

UD_MeterVertPadding
Float Property UD_MeterVertPadding = 1.50 Auto Hidden

Vertical spacing between widgets, measured in their heights.

Do not edit, READ ONLY!. Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

UD_EnableDeviceIcons
Bool Property UD_EnableDeviceIcons Hidden

Enable device icons (renderend in W_ICON_CLUSTER_DEVICES).

Do not edit, READ ONLY!. Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

Enable (de)buffs icons (renderend in W_ICON_CLUSTER_EFFECTS).

Do not edit, READ ONLY!. Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

Bool Property UD_EnableCNotifications Hidden

Do not edit, READ ONLY!. Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

Do not edit, READ ONLY!. Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

Int Property UD_TextLineLength = 100 Auto Hidden

Do not edit, READ ONLY! Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

Int Property UD_TextReadSpeed = 20 Auto Hidden

Display time of text on the screen (measured in the number of characters per second).

Do not edit, READ ONLY!. Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

Do not edit, READ ONLY!.

Bool Property UD_FilterVibNotifications = True Auto Hidden

If True, then some redundant notifications from vibrators will be ignored.

Do not edit, READ ONLY!. Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

Text fade time.

Do not edit, READ ONLY!. Configurable on MCM UI Widgets page by user.

Int Property UD_TextAnchor Hidden

W_POSY_BELOWCENTER = 1

Initialization
OnUIReload
Function OnUIReload(
Bool abGameLoad
)

In this function, the interface is reloaded: - after loading the save; - after changing the interface rendering method: standard or using iWW.

To add initialization of your own controls, use mod event UD_AfterUIReload.

Parameters
abGameLoad
Bool

True if function called on game reload.

InitWidgetsRequest
Function InitWidgetsRequest(
Bool abGameLoad = False,
Bool abMeters = False,
Bool abIcons = False,
Bool abText = False
)

Function for asynchronous interface rebuilding. The interface will be rebuilt in the next OnUpdate function call.

Used if the interface is rendered with iWW.

Parameters
abGameLoad
Bool

Indicates that the function is called immediately after loading the game.  It is means that saved widget IDs from iWW are not valid and must be recreated without attempting to delete old instances.

abMeters
Bool

Request to rebuild meter widgets.

abIcons
Bool

Request to rebuild icons.

abText
Bool

Request to rebuild notification lines.

Meter Widgets API
Meter_Register
Function Meter_Register(
String asName,
String asIcon = ""
)

Registers new meter widget.

Although this method will work even in standard render mode, but to display a new widget, you will need to switch to iWW rendering mode.

Parameters
asName
String

Meter name.

asIcon
String

Icon's name.

Meter_SetVisible
Function Meter_SetVisible(
String asName,
Bool abVisible
)

Changes meter visibility.

Parameters
asName
String

Meter name.

abVisible
Bool

If true then meter becomes visible.

Meter_SetFillPercent
Function Meter_SetFillPercent(
String asName,
Float afValue,
Bool abForce = false
)

Changes the filling of the indicator.

Parameters
asName
String

Meter name.

afValue
Float

Value to fill the meter's bar in percents (0.0 ... 100.0).

abForce
Bool

Instant change of the value (applied only in standard rendering mode).

Int

Primary color of the meter.

Int

Secondary color of the meter.

Int

Flash color of the meter.

Function Meter_Flash(

)

Causes meter to flash.

Parameters

Meter_SetIcon
Function Meter_SetIcon(
String asMeterName,
String asIconName
)

Sets small icon next to the meter widget. Works only in iWW rendering mode.

Parameters
asMeterName
String

Meter name.

asIconName
String

Icon file name (relative to folder "<Data>\interface\exported\widgets\iwant\widgets\library").

Notifications API
Notification_Push
Function Notification_Push(
String asText,
Int aiColor = 0xFFFFFF
)

Adds a text notification to the queue.

In the standard rendering mode, this notification will be displayed in the usual form at the top left corner of the screen.

In iWW rendering mode, notifications will be displayed according to the settings of this module.

Parameters
asText
String

A text notification to be added to the queue.

aiColor
Int

color of the text (applies only if iWW is used).

Notification_Reset
Function Notification_Reset()

Function clears the notification queue. Works only in iWW rendering mode.

Status Effect API
StatusEffect_Register
Function StatusEffect_Register(
String asName,
Int aiClusterId = -1,
Int aiVariant = -1
)

Register new status effect (or change existing). Status effect will use icon from "<Data>\interface\exported\widgets\iwant\widgets\library" folder with the same name.  If an icon variant is also specified (see <aiVariant> argumet), it will be added to the effect name to get the file name.  For example.  If asName is "effect-exhaustion" and aiVariant equals 2, then file name will be "effect-exhaustion-2.dds".  If asName is "effect-orgasm" and aiVariant equals 0, then file name will be "effect-orgasm.dds".

Although this method will work even in standard render mode, but to see effect from it, you will need to switch to iWW rendering mode.

Parameters
asName
String

Effect name (and base part of the icon file name).

aiVariant
Int

Icon variant. If equal to -1, then the previous value is kept.

aiClusterId
Int

Icon cluster (0 or 1 for device or effect cluster). If equal to -1, then the previous value is kept.

StatusEffect_Remove
Function StatusEffect_Remove(
String asName
)

Removes status effect registration.

Although this method will work even in standard render mode, but to see effect from it, you will need to switch to iWW rendering mode.

Parameters
asName
String

Effect name.

StatusEffect_GetVariant
Int Function StatusEffect_GetVariant(
String asName
)

Returns the currently used variant of the icon.

Parameters
asName
String

Effect name.

Returns

Icon variant or -1 if an effect with specified name was not found.

StatusEffect_SetVisible
Function StatusEffect_SetVisible(
String asName,
Bool abVisible = True
)

Shows or hides status effect icon.

Although this method will work even in standard render mode, but to see effect from it, you will need to switch to iWW rendering mode.

Parameters
asName
String

Effect name.

abVisible
Bool

Visibility.

StatusEffect_SetMagnitude
Function StatusEffect_SetMagnitude(
String asName,
Int aiMagnitude
)

Sets magnitude of the effect. The color of the icon changes depending on the value.

Although this method will work even in standard render mode, but to see effect from it, you will need to switch to iWW rendering mode.

Parameters
asName
String

Effect name.

aiMagnitude
Int

Magnitude.

StatusEffect_AdjustMagnitude
Function StatusEffect_AdjustMagnitude(
String asName,
Int aiAdjustValue,
Bool abControlVisibility = True
)

Adjusts magnitude by the given value. The color of the icon changes depending on the value.

Although this method will work even in standard render mode, but to see effect from it, you will need to switch to iWW rendering mode.

Parameters
asName
String

Effect name.

aiAdjustValue
Int

Adjust value.

abControlVisibility
Bool

If true and magnitude is 0, then the icon will be hidden. If true and magnitude > 0, then the icon will be shown.

StatusEffect_SetBlink
Function StatusEffect_SetBlink(
String asName,
Bool abBlink = True
)

Sets icon blinking (periodic change of alpha in range 25 .. 100).

Although this method will work even in standard render mode, but to see effect from it, you will need to switch to iWW rendering mode.

Parameters
asName
String

Effect name.

abBlink
Bool

Blink.

StatusEffect_ResetValues
Function StatusEffect_ResetValues()

Resets all effects to default state

Although this method will work even in standard render mode, but to see effect from it, you will need to switch to iWW rendering mode.
